thread.section_title: Firmoo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Firmoo | www.firmoo.com | 2 of 13
thread.title: Ryan Chiang

author: Ryan Chiang
title: Ryan Chiang
text: At first, I was skeptical about ordering a pair of glasses online, but in the end it was absolutely worth my money. The initial pair of glasses I received, I realized that I had made a mistake in ordering. When I contacted a CSR, they were absolutely helpful in getting me a new pair as soon as possible. I will certainly be shopping here again in the foreseeable future, as they have earned my trust as a customer and as a great company.
